name: Raider Legend
description:
In a moody blood moon night, you stumbled upon a tomb which didn't belong there before. Out of curiosity, you stepped in the entrance. The gate suddenly fell right as you entered the tomb. After a few close calls, you escaped with tons of treasures, and became a tomb raider since then.

This is a level-based game. You are playing in levels designed by developers. Level editor will come to the game, and you can play maps created by your friends and the community, or create your own and share it with others!

Control

Movement - WASD or arrow keys to dash around. Swiping with you mouse also wroks.

Pausing - Space bar

Meanings of Colours / Colors
  • Purple - Neutral or Dangerous
  • Yellow - Safe
  • Cyan and Flashing Cyan - Dangerous

This game is inspired by Tomb of the Mask. Hope you enjoy it :)

Please leave comments as they are crucial to help this game grow.
